critique: This document is an amendment to a previous executive order. It removes the phrase ", an inherently governmental function," from the first sentence of the original order. It also clarifies that the order is intended only to improve the internal management of the executive branch and does not create any enforceable rights. This suggests a slight move towards limiting the scope and potential impact of the original order. There is no clear indication of ideological tilt, immigration approach, federalism implications, national security concerns, economic regulation, or social inclusion. The change seems primarily focused on internal executive branch management and limiting legal enforceability.
